product_overview: Mobilindo is a comprehensive web-based used car marketplace platform designed for Surya Abadi Showroom. It enables buyers and external sellers to register, authenticate, browse, compare, transact, and manage vehicles seamlessly, integrating AI assistant support, payment processing, and administrative controls.
core_goals: Provide a seamless multi-role ecosystem for buyers, external sellers, showroom admins, and showroom owners.
Enable comprehensive vehicle catalog management with advanced search, filtering, and comparison features.
Facilitate secure and efficient transaction flows from car selection, credit simulation, trading-in, to payment confirmation.
Implement real-time communication through chat and AI chatbot support with escalation to human operators.
Offer robust admin dashboards for user, vehicle, content, ad, transaction, and system monitoring management.
Support strategic business analytics, reporting, finances, and partnership management for showroom owners.
Ensure data security, user-friendly multi-device UI, and compliant with privacy and payment regulations.
key_features: Multi-role authentication and session management allowing buyers and sellers to switch modes seamlessly.
Advanced car catalog with detailed vehicle pages, filtering, search, and price comparison.
Transaction processing including purchase, payment validation, invoice generation, and history tracking.
Test drive booking system with admin approval and scheduling.
Trade-in system with estimations, negotiations, survey, and contract generation.
Wishlist management for saving favorite vehicles.
Credit simulation tool with EMI calculation and budget-based car recommendations.
AI-powered chatbot for assistance with human escalation capabilities.
Advertisement management including creation, validation, payment, promotion, and moderation workflows.
Content management system for articles, news, and customer reviews.
Comprehensive admin dashboard managing cars, users, ads, content, chat, payments, and system configuration.
Executive dashboards for showroom owners featuring KPIs, strategic management, financial approvals, partnership handling, and comprehensive reporting.
Robust user profile management and real-time messaging system.
System administration with monitoring, security, user rights management, backup, and configuration.
user_flow_summary: User Registration/Login: Users register or login with full validation, session handling, and role-based dashboard access.
Car Catalog Browsing: Users search, filter, and compare used cars, view detailed specs, and contact sellers or showroom.
Transaction Flow: Users select cars, confirm purchases, complete payments, receive invoice and transaction status updates.
Test Drive Booking: Users submit requests, admins review availability, schedule or deny, notifying users accordingly.
Trade-in Process: Users submit car info, upload photos, receive price estimates, negotiate, schedule survey, finalize trade-in.
Wishlist Management: Users add/remove favorite cars, browse wishlist, and access detail views.
Credit Simulation: Users input or pick cars, set credit parameters, get EMI results and budget recommendations.
Chat System: Users send/receive messages; chatbot AI automatically responds or escalates to human support.
Advertisement Posting: Users create ads with photo upload; admins moderate before publishing; payments handled for promotions.
Admin Management: Admins manage cars, users, ads, payment systems, contents, chat escalations, and analytics reporting.
Executive Features: Owners monitor KPIs, approve finances, manage partners, create strategic plans, and generate detailed reports.
System Administration: Admin manages platform monitoring, security, configuration, user access, and system health.
validation_criteria: Successful registration and login with robust input validation and session management.
Accurate vehicle catalog search, filter, detail viewing and comparison.
End-to-end transaction processing with correct invoice generation, payment validation, and status updates.
Test drive and trade-in workflows with admin approval and notifications working as intended.
Reliable wishlist and credit simulation tools producing correct recommendations.
Chatbot AI response accuracy and seamless escalation to human agents.
Advertisement life cycle fully managed with moderation and payment processing.
Robust admin controls for user, vehicle, transaction, content, ad, and chat management.
Executive dashboards delivering real-time KPIs, analytics, and comprehensive reporting.
System adhering to security, privacy, PCI DSS compliance, and backup standards.
Cross-device compatibility and intuitive UX/UI design for all roles.
